longBusinessSummary: IPE Universal Inc. engages in the development and commercialization of mobile Voice over Internet protocol (VoIP) communications and mobile advertising applications in Malaysia and Hong Kong. The company offers a proprietary mobile marketing platform that enables its customers to sell advertisement banners on the mobile phones. It also provides mobile VoIP gateway and mobile multimedia sharing gateway software systems to channel partners, private label partners, and customers; MobiCAST, an access location based mobile-Web social network and microblogging service; and MobiREWARDS program to advertisers. In addition, the company is involved in the provision of consultancy services for the design and integration of solar PV-wind power generation systems and power plants for the production of biomass energy using wood residues, oil palm stems, and fronds as feedstock. Keynes Technology Co Ltd. markets its solar PV-wind and solar PV-Biomass hybrid energy systems under the Aris brand. The company was formerly known as Keynes Technology Co Ltd. and changed its name to IPE Universal Inc. in May 2021. IPE Universal Inc. was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Spokane, Washington.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Hon Kit Wong
companyOfficers.title: Chief Financial Officer, Principal Accounting Officer, Senior Vice President and Secretary
